layer.name: Sacrifice
layer.definition: Pour out for others with no expectation of return.

questions.text: I enter into others' emotional pain — not just offering advice from a distance, but feeling with them in their suffering.
I give my emotional stability to help regulate others — being a calming presence even when it drains me.
I absorb emotional difficulty from others so they don't have to carry it alone — I take on weight that isn't mine.
I make myself emotionally available for others' crises even when it's inconvenient or exhausting.
I have given significant emotional investment to people who later hurt me or left — and I don't regret loving them.
